reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Estella is a small town located on the Camino de Santiago only 25 miles from Pamplona. Should you find yourself wanting to stay here consider this hotel. The biggest downside is parking. The hotel does have a garage which is a bit on the expensive side. We did find a public spot not too far from the hotel and carried our luggage the short distance. The hotel itself is in the middle of a pedestrian zone. Street noise wasn't bad for a Saturday evening. By 10 PM it was very quiet around the hotel. Sleep comfort was great with a comfortable king size bed. The room was bit on the small side but all furnishings were top notch. The staff were also very friendly and helpful. We enjoyed the buffet breakfast and had some of the best croissants during our trip across northern Spain. We thoroughly enjoy our brief stay in Estella.
reviews.title: Wonderful Small Hotel

reviews.text: After walking 6 days on Camino (through hail, snow, rain, wind and landslides!) stumbling on this little gem was like arriving in heaven. We were greeted by a charming member of staff who could not speak English, yet this was no problem at all, she smiled and pointed at maps, making us feel welcome even though we did not speak the local language. This is very much a boutique hotel, with edgy furnishings throughout providing super comfortable beds and linen. Breakfast was included and by Spanish standards was excellent (usually quite basic). The town of Estelle is on the Camino de Santiago, so if you are fed up with sharing a room with snorers... treat yourself, you won't be disappointed.
reviews.title: Luxury in the midst of Camino

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is a wonderful place to stay if you need a bit of luxury whilst walking the Camino. The welcome is the first thing that hits you, genuine charm. The staff were incredibly helpful and eager to please. The room was to die for, great shower and a bed that was huge and comfortable. The breakfast here was probably the most comprehensive we had on our Caminio.
reviews.title: Lovely stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: would highly recommend a stay here. Great location in the old town.
reviews.title: Great hotel in great location with friendly and welcoming atmosphere.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Right in the middle of Estella this hotel is on a pedestrian street but parking is both available by booking with the hotel or by doing what we did - park a few minutes walk away in a car park for free.
reviews.title: Can't imagine a nicer place to stay in Estella
